Luck of the Gods.embed: {"title":"Luck of the Gods","fields":[{"name":"Rank","value":"2"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Paragon"},{"name":"Messiah Frequency","value":"Daily \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Signer Frequency","value":"Free Action"},{"name":"Messiah Trigger","value":"You fail a Skill Check or Accuracy Roll."},{"name":"Signer Trigger","value":"You roll a Skill Check or Accuracy Roll."},{"name":"Messiah Effect","value":"You may reroll this Skill Check or Accuracy Roll."},{"name":"Signer Effect","value":"You may add +4 to this Skill Check or +2 to this Accuracy Roll."}],"footer":{"text":"BatD: p.55"}}

Paragon.embed: {"title":"Paragon","fields":[{"name":"Rank","value":"1"},{"name":"Messiah Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Signer Frequency","value":"Swift Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You hit an enemy with a Struggle Attack"},{"name":"Messiah Effect","value":"When you take Paragon, choose either Body, Mind, or Spirit. You gain +2 to all Skill Checks made with Skills under that group."},{"name":"Signer Effect","value":"You instead choose one of these Skill Groups, and gain a +1 under this category. This lasts until the end of the Scene. You may choose a different Skill Group each time you activate Paragon."}],"footer":{"text":"BatD: p.55"}}

Spirit Mending.embed: {"title":"Spirit Mending","fields":[{"name":"Rank","value":"1"},{"name":"Messiah Frequency","value":"Daily x3 \u2013 Standard Action"},{"name":"Signer Frequency","value":"Standard Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Poke\u0301mon or Trainer"},{"name":"Messiah Effect","value":"When using Spirit Mending, choose one of the following: The Target Heals 30 HP, or the Target recovers two Injuries."},{"name":"Signer Effect","value":"The target recovers 50 HP and one injury."}],"footer":{"text":"BatD: p.55"}}

Blessed Resilience.embed: {"title":"Blessed Resilience","fields":[{"name":"Rank","value":"3"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Blessed Power"},{"name":"Messiah Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Signer Frequency","value":"Standard Action"},{"name":"Messiah Effect","value":"Choose two Types your Patron has Resistance or Immunity to. You gain Resistance to these types."},{"name":"Signer Effect","value":"Choose a single Type your Patron has Resistance or Immunity to. You gain this Resistance to this Type until the end of the Scene. You may choose a different Type each time you use Blessed Resilience."}],"footer":{"text":"BatD: p.56"}}

Insight of the Great Ones.embed: {"title":"Insight of the Great Ones","fields":[{"name":"Rank","value":"3"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Ancient Wisdom"},{"name":"Messiah Frequency","value":"Scene - Swift Action"},{"name":"Signer Frequency","value":"Swift Action"},{"name":"Target","value":"A Poke\u0301mon or Trainer."},{"name":"Messiah Effect","value":"You become aware of any Pacts, Patrons, or Allegiances the Target may have to a Legendary being or any organizations. If this Target has a particular weakness (Both narrative and mechanical), you become aware of it. You also become aware of any goals or motives the Target might possess at the moment."},{"name":"Signer Effect","value":"You learn one of the Target\u2019s weaknesses (Narrative or mechanical). If this target aligned to a Legendary or an organization, you become of aware of this fact, but not of who or what in particular. You also learn if this Targets motives or goals would harm your Patron or their followers."}],"footer":{"text":"BatD: p.56"}}

Blessed Power.embed: {"title":"Blessed Power","fields":[{"name":"Rank","value":"2"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Blessed Strike"},{"name":"Messiah Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Signer Frequency","value":"Swift Action"},{"name":"Messiah Effect","value":"Choose a Damaging Move on your Patron\u2019s Level Up List that has a Damage Base of 8 or lower and matches one of their Types. You learn this Move."},{"name":"Signer Effect","value":"You instead gain this chosen Move until the end of combat. You may choose a different Move each time you activate this Sign."}],"footer":{"text":"BatD: p.55"}}

Blessed Strike.embed: {"title":"Blessed Strike","fields":[{"name":"Rank","value":"1"},{"name":"Messiah Frequency","value":"Scene x3 \u2013 Free Action"},{"name":"Signer Frequency","value":"Free Action"},{"name":"Trigger","value":"You hit an enemy with a Struggle Attack"},{"name":"Messiah Effect","value":"Your Struggle Attack\u2019s Type matches that of your Patron. If your Patron has two Types, choose one."},{"name":"Signer Effect","value":"Your Struggle Attack deals Typeless Damage."}],"footer":{"text":"BatD: p.55"}}

Ancient Wisdom.embed: {"title":"Ancient Wisdom","fields":[{"name":"Rank","value":"1"},{"name":"Messiah Frequency","value":"Static"},{"name":"Signer Frequency","value":"Free Action"},{"name":"Messiah Effect","value":"You gain an extra Dice on Education: Occult Checks, as well as any Check dealing with Occult topics or situations."},{"name":"Signer Effect","value":"You may use Ancient Wisdom while making an Education: Occult Check to add an additional Two Dice."}],"footer":{"text":"BatD: p.55"}}

Soul Mending.embed: {"title":"Soul Mending","fields":[{"name":"Rank","value":"2"},{"name":"Prerequisites","value":"Spirit Mending"},{"name":"Messiah Frequency","value":"One Time Use\/10 \u2013 Extended Action"},{"name":"Signer Frequency","value":"Interrupt"},{"name":"Messiah Trigger","value":"A Trainer or Poke\u0301mon dies."},{"name":"Signer Trigger","value":"A Trainer or Poke\u0301mon is reduced"},{"name":"Messiah Effect","value":"Your divine powers allow you to intervene, saving the Target's life. They are set to 5 Injuries that will heal at half the normal rate, and 1 HP"},{"name":"Signer Effect","value":"The Target receives no further injuries after being reduced below 0 HP. If being knocked out alone would set them to 10 injuries, they instead are set to 9 Injuries."}],"footer":{"text":"BatD: p.55"}}
